Back, Stanley...you're going back...back to when it all began. Are you going back yet? Come on, get back, ve haven't got all day. Now BOTH EYES are locked in place. The patient is hypnoti
A squat, lumpy TEACHER, MISS HUDLAPP, is straining to era Gettysburg Address, which is written along the very top o blackboard. There's an obtrusive, rhythmic BANGING noice
It was third grade. The teacher was Miss Hudlapp. She was kinda squat and lumpy - she smelled funny - but she was kind.
(turning around suddenly) How many times have I told you? In this class we do not pound tenpenny nails into Stanley's head!

Hapless ten-year-old STANLEY, still goofy and bespectacle front-row desk. NAILS stick out of his head. The FOUR MEA around him lower their hammers and return to their seats, A dreamy SMILE crosses STANLEY's face as he gazes at MISS

You know how some teachers have those, kind of, flaps on their arms - those big sacks of limp flab that like, dangle? As MISS HUDLAPP pulls her sweater off, TWO MASSIVE ARM-FL gallons of flab apiece - SPILL OUT and SMACK INTO THE FLO MISS HUDDLAPP claps two erasers together, kicking up a cl Young STANLEY watches, transfixed by her massive ARM FLAP on the gigantic ARM FLAPS as they swing hypnotically back with a loud SLAP each time they collide.

It sounds weird...but for some reason, as I watched those big old flaps of hers, I began to feel...well...oddly... Now we TRACK IN on the mesmerized STANLEY. A SONG comes u Donna Summer, "I FEEL LOVE."

...aroused. (beat) And then the horror began. DOINK! STANLEY looks down at his LAP in horror. The boys around him are pointing and tittering. Grimacing in embarrassment, he discreetly places a heavy his lap, suppressing the bulge in his pants. But SPROING! goes flying across the room. The BULGE is fighting back! The kids DUCK AND COVER beneath their desks as STANLEY sl textbooks onto his lap. It's no use - the WHOLE STACK goe BOOKS come raining down on the entire class! Now MISS HUD directly at him...
Young man. What's that in your lap? She marches toward him. STANLEY pulls his BACKPACK over h

It was useless. Like putting a baseball cap on the Washington Monument. And then...all at once ...there he was. The BACKPACK bucks and wriggles, as if something inside i OUT. And then - with a flourish of rousing disco strings
Monkeybone!! The libidinous cartoon monkey BURSTS OUT of the backpack, HUDLAPP - and announces, in his Barry White baritone:

Oooo-oo-ooh, baby. I love your way. KC and the SUNSHINE BAND comes up underneath as MONKEYBON front of the class. He grabs MISS HUDLAPP by the hands an dancing The Bump with her ARM FLAPS. Butt left, WHAP. But The KIDS are bug-eyed - agog. With each WHAP their little back and forth as if they're watching a nude tennis match

A roomful of LIVE HUMANS watching the cartoon, heads turn with the kids onscreen. TV-INDUSTRY HIPSTERS, AD EXECS, M REPS...they're all guests at this sneak preview of the Mo and they're LAUGHING UPROARIOUSLY. In the midst of the crowd is a handsome young couple: JUL STU MILEY. JULIE's a research scientist, brainy, professi abnormally well-adjusted - and pretty enough that she'd b if it weren't for a prominent goofy streak. STU is the one guy in the auditorium who isn't laughing a on the screen. In fact, he's solemn as a judge - peering around to see how the rest of the audience is responding. Why? Because he's the cartoonist who created the characte In his looks (gangly, disheveled) and manner (sardonic, s deprecating), he's the obvious model for the character of
As the monkey dance continues, we ZOOM IN on the mortifie LITTLE STANLEY. His eyes begin doing the familiar HYPNO-S
A CUCKOO pops out of a wall clock. ADULT STANLEY'S THUMB mouth. He awakens from his trance in a cold sweat.
How about it, Doc? Can you help me?

Not overnight. These imaginary monkey cases take time. I vould estimate...roughly... On the desk is a CATALOGUE, open to a two-page spread dep foot CABIN CRUISER. "NEW FOR SUMMER! ONLY $229,999.95!" W hand, the SHRINK is working a CALCULATOR...
Twelve years and three months ought to do it. The SHRINK hustles STANLEY to the door and shakes his han
One question, doc - what did you mean when you said "imaginary"?
All in good time, my boy. All in good time. The SHRINK shoves STANLEY out and slams the door behind h Then he doubles over, WEEPING with LAUGHTER.
Vot a crackpot! Monkey on ze back - HAH!! ROLL
Now he notices a BACKPACK, which STANLEY has left on the TWITCHES slightly - of its own free will.
Imaginary, huh? You quack.

A WINDOW shatters. The SHRINK comes hurtling out. MONKEYB HIM like Slim Pickens riding an H-bomb, hootin' and holle way down to the street. SPLAT! A gob of gore hits STANLEY in the face as he exits He kneels on the sidewalk - finding a PIPE and a GOATEE.
Aw, Monkeybone! At this rate I'll never find a good shrink.
Those guys are a waste of money! I'll show you how to stop sucking your thumb... MONKEYBONE sticks his thumb in his butt as he and STANLEY into the sunset.
STANDING O from the crowd as the cartoon ends and the lig HERB, an all-purpose sidekick type, appears at the podium

Thank you...that's our pilot...the good news is, Comedy Channel has just picked us up with an order for six new episodes! HERB leads a round of APPLAUSE. JULIE nudges STU - the on room who's still in his seat.

Now, let's give it up for the guy who started it all. Creator of America's most disturbed comic strip...the man behind the monkey...Mister Stu Miley! A SPOTLIGHT hits him, and he STANDS to tumultuous applaus genuinely stunned. He can't believe it's happening. JULIE surreptitiously PINCHES him on the bottom, giving h WINKS at him. He shoots her a small private smile - then at the adoring crowd.
STU working his way through a crowd of well-wishers and F
I don't actually draw all the animation, no. We have sweatshop workers who couldn't get jobs at Nike doing that. A beautiful, heavily-pierced FEMALE FAN hands STU a marke
Mr. Miley, would you draw Monkeybone on my belly? As a guide?
Guide...?
For my tattoo artist? She exposes her taut midriff. STU thinks for a moment, th work. When he's done, Monkeybone appears to be climbing o girl's pants and WAVING to her. Nearby FANS APPLAUD.
Wait! You have to draw the rest of him - She begins unbuckling her belt so STU will have enough ro Monkeybone's bottom half. STU demurs...
I - I have to, uh, check in with my doctor. DO-
He wanders across the room, finds JULIE deep in conversat bunch of other GUESTS, and pulls her aside.
Hey, Doc. Come here. There's something really cool I want to show you. He grabs her by the sleeve, pulls her across the floor to
There's nothing "cool" about it - it's a stairway landing fire doors that open onto the parking lot outside.
See these doors? The cool thing is, you go out ...they close...you can't get back in! He opens one door and holds it for JULIE.
You want to leave? But Stu - you're a big hit! Everyone loves you!
They don't love me. They love Monkeybone.
It was you who got the standing O. It was you drawing on the belly over there...
That was especially Monkeybone. Come on, Doc, I don't want to be stuck here with this bunch of media creeps. I just want to be us. Home. Alone! (conspiratorially) I have something I have to give you.
Can't you give it to me later?

Yeah, I could, but the thing is, if later got here sooner, it would be...better. He gives up trying to explain...pulls her close and kisse moment they completely forget about the party in the next Then HERB appears behind them, trying to catch STU's eye the clinch to break up. Finally he pries them apart:
Sorry, Julie - won't be a minute. Now Stu - I know you don't like the idea, but you really ought to talk to these guys -
Julie and I - we were just gonna go... But before STU knows what's hit him, HERB is leading him
Go? There's a potload of money here, pal. You got three major toy companies...you got the guys from Burger God over here...
Burger God. The ones that found the pig hair in the french fries?

Never proven. They're ready to pop for a pre- emptive endorsement. Kids love Burger God - The MERCHANDISERS shoot STU an expectant wave. STU waves in the opposite direction. HERB grabs him by the sleeve.
Herb, it's too much. It's all out of hand.
Do you know what kind of opportunity you have here? You gotta strike. I'm talking mansions. Lamborghinis. Champagne for mouthwash when you brush your teeth!
I don't want to be rich. It's just a trap!
Being rich is not a trap. That is a dirty lie perpetuated by rich people to keep the failures from killing them.
Herb. I have to go.
Why?
I got the ring. (beat) Tonight's the night, Herb. Tonight's the night. He nods toward JULIE, who's at the open bar grabbing two punch. HERB realizes a proposal is in the works.
Oh my God...you're proposing?

My life was totally crappy, Herb, and she... fixed it. She made me happy. Which I'd never been. She loves me the way I am - right now. (beat) I don't want everything to change. I don't want her saying yes to some big success. I just want her saying yes to me.
...In some weird way I respect that. JULIE's over by the punchbowl. She sees the two boys star conspiratorially - MAKES A FACE at them as she waves back
Okay then. If I get you out of here - you pop the question - tonight. Or else. Get me? STU nods gravely.

STU, JULIE, and HERB in the parking lot. A small safari o loading enormous boxes full of MONKEYBONE JUNK into STU's stuffed dolls, action figures, board games, lunchboxes, b team jackets and more! STU groans at the sight of it...

They're just prototypes...take 'em home and look at 'em before you say no... (scanning the streets) If you could just hold on a minute or two, we're expecting a couple more trucks. STU GLOWERS at HERB as he opens the car door for JULIE.
Okay, okay! You're a beautiful couple. Go.

STU backs out of his space. The small parking lot is full TRUCKS from would-be merchandisers - all too large for th they're parked in. STU has to keep backing up because the blocked. It's like negotiating a labyrinth.
Look at this! He won't let us leave!
Who?
The monkey!! He's everywhere! He'll take over both our lives if we let him.
Stu - stop it. That monkey is good luck. You thought him up, and everybody loves him, and he's probably going to make you rich. So relax! Enjoy it!
I'm trying. It's weird, that's all. I never had any good luck, until I met you...what if it's all just another bad dream?
What's the "bad" part?
I might wake up.
(laughing; taking his hand) If you do, I'll be right there beside you. So face it. You're just going to have to be happy!
I am happy. It just so happens this is the happiest night of my life. He says it so solemnly that she cracks up. After a moment
A PLASTIC BANNER stretches between two poles on either si to the lot. It shows MONKEYBONE in a typical languorous p It's His World. We Just Live in It!
Sunday Nights This Fall
TWO GUYS on EXTENSION LADDERS are taking the sign down as idles at the exit below. There's a strong wind tonight, a LOSES HOLD of his end of the banner just as he gets it de
As STU pulls into the intersection he sees a DELIVERY TRU in the opposite lane, with a cardboard likeness of MONKEY atop the cab. He chuckles...

That damn monkey is everywh-- Suddenly his view of the street DISAPPEARS. The MONKEYBON fallen DIRECTLY ACROSS HIS WINDSHIELD, like a huge SHROUD see is a great, grinning MONKEY FACE!! JULIE SCREAMS. STU SCREAMS. Unable to see, he slams on th JERKS THE WHEEL RIGHT. Off screen: HORNS BLARING. TIRES SQUEALING. The horrible ON METAL. But Stu's car comes to a halt untouched. After a moment h eyes...and JULIE opens hers...
Did we just - hit something?
I don't think so.

Are you okay?? She thinks it over, nods. STU takes a moment to catch his opens the door gingerly. A HORN BLARES as a car speeds pa opposite lane, nearly taking STU's door off. He jumps bac waits, opens the door again...

His eyes widen in horror as he steps out to survey the sc asphalt is strewn with MONKEYBONE MERCHANDISE - stuffed d lunchboxes. SKID MARKS show where the TRUCK which was car SWERVED... ...and slammed into the rear of a BUICK REGAL, pinning it TELEPHONE POLE. STU races up to the Buick. Its front end like an accordion, but the occupants - a couple of TEENAG the prom - seem to be okay.
Hey! Are you guys all right in there?
We're fine.
That stupid monkey banner! It fell on my windshield - it practically killed us all! (to JULIE) God, Julie, if anything had happened to you -
I'm fine, baby. We're all okay. We were lucky.

I'd better go report this... He spots a PHONE BOOTH and starts across the street. On t plucks a STUFFED MONKEYBONE DOLL off the pavement and CHO both hands. JULIE stays behind with the prom kids. The TEENAGE BOY in glassy-eyed, miserable beyond description.
Dad's car? The BOY begins to SOB softly. JULIE nods in sympathy. Then: EVERYONE WINCES. The air is full of a horrible CREA like nails on a blackboard...
What was that? Did you hear that? The horrible CREAKING NOISE continues. JULIE turns. Behin TELEPHONE POLE that the car slammed into is beginning to TOPPLES. Directly toward...
He sees JULIE running toward him and holds up a single fi

Operator? I want to report an accident. Finally he glances up - just in time to see the TELEPHONE down toward the phone booth like a gigantic sledgehammer. widen. The STUFFED MONKEYBONE slips from his grasp...

A HORRIBLE CRASH. SCREAMS. CAMERA ZEROES IN on the MONKEY STU was holding, surrounded by broken glass, its face twi insane, almost macabre grin. The screen fades to PITCH BLACK for a few seconds...until DISTANT SIREN, and an IMAGE comes swimming into focus...
He's in the back of an ambulance, with PARAMEDICS all aro working feverishly. JULIE hovers above him, holding his h

Stu? I'm here, baby. It's me. It's Julie. I love you. You're gonna be okay, baby, I promise - All at once he seems to be RECEDING from JULIE and the ot SINKING THROUGH the bottom of the stretcher, and BEYOND - floor of the ambulance! JULIE's voice grows weaker, more

I'm here, baby. I won't leave you... And then all trace of the ambulance is gone, and he's flo through some strange LIMBO, surrounded by the silhouettes SHROUDS, with the sound of BIRDS CALLING all around him.. An AWFUL MECHANICAL RATCHETING NOISE fills the soundtrack close - and when they reopen, he finds himself in:

A tiny ROLLER-COASTER CAR descends from dense clouds down an impossibly long and rickety METAL TRACK. The track lea vast black VOID... ...to a tiny ISLAND floating in the darkness...an island unlike a disembodied FIST. And, as the car draws closer, the fist begins to OPEN - t turning into a HAND, with a full-sized TOWN nestled in it town, CARNIVAL LIGHTS begin to glitter. MUSIC begins to t
The car - a one-passenger job with a CARTOON ANIMAL FACE stops with a lurch. STU steps out onto a fog-shrouded TRA PLATFORM. Before he knows it, the little car DEPARTS behi stranded - alone.

Hello? Anybody? - Am I dead? (beat) PLEASE. I'D LIKE TO KNOW IF I'M DEAD. Off in the fog is a big wheeled CART with the sign: "PSYC BAGGAGE CLAIM." There STU finds two SUITCASES and a BACKP examines the TAGS. They all belong to him! He sits on the edge of the cart, opens a SUITCASE, and pu - A bagged copy of Marvel Comics' Conan the Barbarian #1; - An 8mm reel of highlights from Ray Harryhausen's Jason Argonauts, with swordfighting skeletons on the box cover; - A SPIRAL NOTEBOOK, its cover labelled "STU M. - GEOGRAP inside pages covered with drawings of dinosaurs and airpl - Transparent plastic models of "THE VISIBLE MAN" and his VISIBLE WOMAN," with a couple of spare organs that young quite found a place for; - A vinyl LP of "BREAD'S GREATEST HITS," which STU quickl into the suitcase lest anyone see it. As he gathers his bags, he hears odd SQUEAKS and CHITTERI RACCOON (o.s.)

Carry your bags, mister? A STRANGE FURRY CREATURE pops out from beneath the platfo STU's pants leg. It looks like a raccoon, but it's FLAT - pelt. Before STU has time to let out a yell, a FLAT SNAKE slithering out from beneath the baggage cart...
Cigars, mister? Genuine Coobans! STU looks down and sees a SQUASHED RABBIT humping his leg
Wanna meet my sister? These bordertown types are known as ROADKILL, and they're tire tracks to prove it. STU SCREAMS, shakes them off, an
A long stone STAIRWAY leads to decorative wrought-iron GA CARVED SPHINXES sit on either side. As STU races up the s sputtering NEON SIGN comes to life overhead:
A FANFARE BLOWS as the creaky gates begin to part. A SPOT SPHINXES - and they COME TO LIFE! They rise up on their h on boater hats. One of them blows a note on a kazoo...

Weeee...welcome you to Dark Town And while you're in your coma This odd amusement park-town Will be your Home Sweet Homa - STU bolts THROUGH THE GATES, with the ROADKILL TRIO right The indignant SPHINXES exchange a look of outrage.

It's a carny town, a tourist trap, seedy and nightmarish. festive trappings, there's something off about it - an ai and decrepitude - as if they'd tried to turn Alcatraz int and given up halfway through. STU looks back and sees the ROADKILL gaining on him. He s group of OTHER HUMANS...
Help me. Please. There's animals. They - The humans just YAWN. They're COMA VICTIMS, just like STU one of his SUITCASES as the ROADKILL come after him.

Pony ride, Mister? He turns and spots a helpful-looking fellow in a COWBOY O COWBOY is in fact a CENTAUR - rider and mount rolled into The characters who run this place - the BARKERS, TICKET-T OPERATORS - are all weird HYBRIDS, part human, part ANIMA be the ancient Gods of some primitive culture - reduced t street entertainers in this ramshackle resort town. STU pinballs down the street, bouncing from one shock to - JOE CAMEL, doing community service as a STREET SWEEPER
Hey, Mister. Mister! Got a smoke? - a YETI selling SNO-CONES from a cart outside the MORPHE The marquee reads:

First-Run - Continuous Performances - Popular Prices Rated NR-H - Not Recommended for Humans - A CYCLOPS working as a barker at the Penny Arcade; - A VIDEO RENTAL OUTLET - "BAD DREAMS VIDEO," offering yo nightmares, cult and classic, three nights for $2.95. A T DEVIL emerges from the shop carrying a sackful of videos recognizes STU, much to his horror.
Hey, aren't you Stu Miley?
We're big fans.

Could we have your autograph? Reduced to babbling hysteria, STU ducks into the nearest the door, an ANIMATED NEON SIGN shows a happy boozer lift glass, then falling over flat on his back, at which point replaced by the traditional cartoon X's. This is the COMA

STU bursts in, flattens himself against the wall as the R past outside. He's given them the slip. He looks around. The bar's a weird melange of styles. COMA VICTIMS ride ar wheelchairs refurbished as BUMPER CARS, drinking cocktail bottler. A four-armed ELEPHANT GOD is at the Mighty Wurli MERMAID VOCALIST in a half-shell belts out the wistful ly Mercer's "DREAM." And over at the BAR... BULL (o.s.)
New in town, huh? What're you drinking? Out of breath, STU edges toward the bar as the BARTENDER, away to grab a fresh glass.
Chasing me - animals - horrible -
Animals? What kind of animals? STU GAGS. BULL is a full-fledged MINOTAUR, body of a man, BULL. His features are CUBIST - weirdly squashed over to
Yeah, I know - Picasso. Guernica, right? That's what everybody says - although personally, I don't see the resemblance. What are you drinking?
Uhh - martini?
Olive or eyeball?
Olive. - Where exactly am I?
Dark Town. Land of nightmares. I'm Bull.
Stu Miley.

Yeah, I've seen a few of your dreams. You're quite a celebrity down here. STU gives him a cockeyed look. BULL points to a MONITOR m bar, on which a panicked man in pajamas is trying to run through a great sticky SEA OF MOLASSES.

I told you, it's the land of nightmares. Same on every channel...all the stuff people dream, after they have the extra anchovies. He changes channels with a remote. Now we see a guy falli midair, arms and legs flailing, falling, falling, falling
Jeez, it all looks like bad late-night cable.
Sad commentary, huh? Now a small muffled VOICE speaks from the area of STU'S B DISEMBODIED VOICE (o.s.)
"Bull," huh? That's cute. What's your last name - "Shit"??
(turning angrily to STU) I beg your pardon?
I didn't say anything. VOICE (o.s.)
Nice face. Lemme guess. You were in a bullfight ...with a Mack Truck!! STU claps both hands over his mouth to prove he's not the BULL glowers at him, snorting STEAM out of both nostrils.
I was, uh, just getting ready to leave...
Yo, Jumbo. We got us some kind of ventriloquist here. The ELEPHANT GOD from the Wurlitzer organ comes lumbering VOICE (o.s.)

Well, hello, sailor. Get a lot of dates with that ding-dong on your face?? BULL and JUMBO rear back to PUNCH STU'S LIGHTS OUT. He's prayers when his BACKPACK begins to BULGE and QUIVER - an BEAST pops out, CACKLING HIS HEAD OFF!!
Just kiddin', folks! Drinks for everybody - (pointing at STU) On him!! HIYA, BOSS!! BULL and JUMBO back off, STUNNED. The monkey grabs STU'S a big wet SMOOCH right on his NOSE. STU SCREAMS.
TIGHT ON an EEG monitor. There's a sudden BLIP on the rea
Just a spike, ma'am. It happens. It's perfectly natural with coma patients.

I'm a doctor too. I know this man's brain - JULIE strokes STU's limp hand. He's COMATOSE, cocooned in wires and tubes. His head and shoulders are heavily banda hooked up to as much machinery as you can cram into one r
Go home, Doctor. Rest. Come back when you can do us some good.
Dead on her feet, JULIE stumbles toward the exit. As she' passes the WAITING ROOM -

Julie? She turns and sees an older colleague from work - ALICE - doorway. Hovering right behind ALICE is HERB. And behind It appears that almost everyone in the waiting room is a and STU's. Disheveled and groggy, they rouse themselves a way over to JULIE's side. She's overcome with emotion.
The sound of the key in the lock is met by INSANE BARKING ALICE enter and are met by BUSTER, the pet basset - jumpi like crazy after 24 hours without food or human company.
Now don't pick a fight. I'm staying over.

Oh, poor Buster. He hasn't been fed in a day and a half. Let me get some food... ALICE kneels to play with the dog. She hears a sudden GAS kitchen. JULIE is standing by the open refrigerator, wear absolutely stricken expression...
ALICE finds JULIE holding a bottle of champagne - Veuve C Grande Dame 1989 - all wrapped up in a bow and ribbon.
Special occasion?
I don't know. I guess it was... She bursts into tears. ALICE sits her down at the kitchen takes the champagne from her.
Don't get all poignant. We're keeping this bottle on ice. When he comes around you're going to need it.

A limp JULIE soaking in a steamy tub, one arm dangling ov the vanity is a framed PHOTO STRIP, four poses for a doll first three, STU and JULIE are making outrageously goony fourth, they imitate the stern-faced farm couple from Ame She gazes at it for a long, long time. Eventually she smi

OPEN on two PHOTOS, mounted in a single frame. On the lef KEATON, droopy-eyed, in his familiar porkpie hat and vest a Photoshopped image of BUSTER THE BASSETT HOUND, in the wearing Keaton's hat and vest. These photos are on the wall of the cramped room which se studio and JULIE's office. MONKEYBONE STRIPS are scattere drafting table. ALICE is making up the sofa as a guest be As she's hanging her coat in the closet she comes across CANVAS in the back, stashed behind a battered portfolio a of spiral-bound sketchbooks. She pulls it out. She's obvi by it, but she can't tear her eyes away... She's still gaping at the painting when JULIE enters in a robe.
Who did this?
Stu. That was right about the time we met.
When he first came in to the sleep lab?
Yeah...before your time. The canvas depicts a group of SURGEONS with the faces of standing over a HUMAN PATIENT, replacing his internal org MACHINE PARTS. The style is at once cartoony and unsettli
Jesus, honey...he always joked about you curing him, but I never realized what you cured him from.

He hadn't gotten a good night's sleep in years. The nightmares would wake him up, and he'd start right in painting... (chuckling) That boy looked like pluperfect hell. ALICE's gaze goes from the nightmare paintings to the MON tacked up over the drafting table.
How do you get from here - to there?
Switch hands.
What?

I'm serious. It was bicameral disjunction - right brain and left brain out of balance. He was a rightie, so I made him switch the pencil to his left hand. Just to see what'd come out. A smile comes to JULIE's face. She settles in on the floo and digs through the various portfolios until she comes u quickie CARTOON on the back of a napkin - the prototype f
Monkeybone?

Left-handed, he was funny. He'd been doing all this scary, intense work...then he found out he could draw this stuff, and make me laugh, and he liked that. (shrugging) And then the nightmares just...stopped.
Wow - two guys in the same brain. - Which one did you fall in love with? JULIE smiles at the cartoon. She isn't telling.
I've put a ton of work into that boy, Alice. I am not going to let him get away from me.
JULIE, in her white lab coat, wanders through Intensive C WOMAN hunched over STU's bed, BAWLING HER EYES OUT.
Kimmy...? KIMMY looks up. She's crying so much she can barely recog
Oh, Julie...my poor Stu...my poor baby brother...
When'd you get in?
An hour ago. (gathering herself) I tried to prepare myself, but I didn't know he would be like, like this. I can't even bear to look at him... How about you? You're okay?
I'm fine, Kimmy. Fine.
I had so much I always wanted to say to him. At least he had a chance to give you the ring.
The ring...

Grandmama's ring. The engagement ring. He asked me to send it to him - JULIE turns to look at STU in the bed. The certain knowle about to propose is like a knife in her heart. KIMMY feel having let the cat out of the bag, but before they can ha
Mrs. Brewster? Julie? I'm Dr. Edelstein. Cheery DR. EDELSTEIN enters. He shakes hands with the wom STU's readouts, making notations on his clipboard.
Vital signs have stabilized. That's good.
Can you give us a realistic sense of my brother's chances?
He's held on this far. We can't do much but wait and see.
But these...machines are what's keeping him alive, is that right? This remark sends a shiver down JULIE's spine, but she ke
At the moment, yes.
Can you give me a realistic idea...of how long this is going to last?
Comas are unpredictable. He could wake up today, tomorrow, a month from now...
Honey, I have to clarify this. The thing is, Dr. Edelstein, my brother has an absolute horror of doctors - hospitals - needles - all of it -
Kimmy, he doesn't know what's going on. He doesn't even know he's in a -
Please, Julie. This is not easy for me. Our father took a long time to die. A long time. It just about killed us all. And Stu and I made a pact that when our time came - we wouldn't let it drag out.
It's too soon even to - talk about that!
Give me a date, Doctor.
Three months. (pause) There's always some brain damage. But at three months...the chances of coming back shrink dramatically with every day.

I want him to have every chance, Doctor. We can certainly give it...three months. No one says anything. But both women look at STU, and the other, and everyone knows exactly where everyone else sta a sinking feeling that STU is working on a 3-month deadli
A beauty pageant - shapely INGENUES in EVENING GOWNS bein an EMCEE with enormous teeth.

And now the last of our five finalists...Miss Michigan...GEORGE T. WILLOUGHBY! GEORGE is a pudgy shmoe with a small pencil mustache who' glasses, a necktie, and NOTHING ELSE. He steps forward, h briefcase in front of his crotch, looking EXTREMELY MORTI
And now George will give us his analysis of Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle as it pertains to third-world economics!! CAMERA PULLS BACK - and we realize we're in:

where BULL the BARTENDER and a number of PATRONS are watc nightmare on the TV mounted over the bar. Onscreen, NUDE GEORGE is sweating bullets. He has no idea and the audience is beginning to laugh at him. In a despe attempt to buy time...he begins to SING.

I'm gonna wash that man right outta my hair! In fact he goes into a little softshoe, keeping the brief over his crotch. Unfortunately, THE CASE POPS OPEN, dumpi LINGERIE all over the stage. The weeping GEORGE must craw fours to retrieve it... By now the onlookers at the bar are CRACKING UP. All exce lonely, disconsolate fellow on the last stool, nursing a
Hey, Stu, why so glum? Everybody loves a good humiliation nightmare.
Three months, Bull. Three months tonight. Three months since the accident - and I'm no closer to going home than I was then.
Aw, buck up. Have another 'tini.

I'm sick of martinis. I'm sick of the waiting, and the carnival rides, and watching people's nightmares. And of course, I need not add - He GRIMACES at MONKEYBONE, who's stretched out atop the m at the other end of the room. The MERMAID CHANTEUSE is si Dietrich number, "The Laziest Gal in Town" - or at least because MONKEYBONE is caterwauling behind her. By the tim the grand finale, he's practically BAYING AT THE MOON. Pissed off, she SHAKES her FIST at MONKEYBONE and pulls t clamshell SHUT. This suits MONKEYBONE just fine, as it le in the spotlight to soak up what little applause there is
Thank you, thank you for that very modest response. I know you're all in comas, but still. And now...it's dedication time! He gestures to JUMBO, the elephant organist, who begins t

We've got a special dedication tonight. This one's from my ever-lovin' boss, Mr. Stu Mopey - I mean Miley - and we're sendin' it up to a very special lady in the land of the living. Yes, I do mean Julie - the beautiful Miss Julie - who, if she has a brain in her head, is shacked up right now with some good-lookin' doc she met in the E.R.! (pointing at STU) JUST KIDDING, BUDDY! Because if we know anything about Miss Julie, we know she is faithful, loyal, and true. Even if her boyfriend is an eggplant. Which is why we're dedicating...this very special tune...to her. Jumbo? JUMBO's tasteful vamping gives way to a RAUNCHY ROCK BEAT MONKEYBONE begins STRUTTING across the top of the piano, grinding and shaking his booty to the tune of -

MAH baby does the Hanky-Panky! UNHH! MAH baby does the Hanky-Panky! UNHH! MONKEYBONE sings the same poignant line over and over unt storming over from the bar and YANKS HIM off the Wurlitze of his scrawny NECK. A trouper to the end, MONKEYBONE WAVES at the crowd even him off to an empty table in the farthest corner of the r
You have humiliated me in public for the last time.
I doubt that. Besides, I can't help myself. I'm just a figment of your imagination.
Then you can learn to act normally. I had to!
Aw, come on. You know you love me. You're a masochistic pain freak. You gotta love me.
I am not. And I don't gotta. MONKEYBONE waves and winks at every female who passes by. upside the head.
You are too! Mooning over Julie when we could both be gettin' some o' this fine local action. It's not like she's gonna know. Out of town, under five minutes, and in a coma don't count.

Sorry. The women here aren't my type. Most of them aren't even my species. Cocktail waitress KITTY, a seven-foot cat-faced feline se in her skimpy black dress and shows STU a Cheshire-cat gr reclines, Odalisque-style, on the table.
Hellooooooooo, Kitty.
Hiya, Stu. Refill on that martini?
I'd like something with an umbrella in it and a really smutty name. Like a...Sex Behind the Sofa with Your Parents in the Same Room Watching "The Brady Bunch."
Nothing for him! He's being repressed.
Is something wrong, Stu? You seem so tense.
Aaah, it's the same as always...poor mope's just wishin' he was me.
I've been trying to get through to the head guy - the nightmare god - what's his name?
Hypnos?
Yeah. To see if he could expedite my case. But I wait, and I wait, and...I'm starting to think I'll never see her again. A softie at heart, KITTY sits across from STU and takes h

I shoulda proposed, Kitty. That way at least she'd know how I feel. That way she'd...wait for me. She leans forward sympathetically. From this particular v MONKEYBONE has an unobstructed view of KITTY's cleavage. - although he's not quite as obvious about staring.
She is waiting for you, Stu. I know she is. Guys like you don't come along that often. Believe me, I know. MONKEYBONE slinks over behind STU - up onto his shoulder into his ear:
My Fellow Americans. I have a dream. Let us boldly go where no man has gone before.
(trying to ignore him) I'm sorry, Kitty - what were you saying?

I mean it, Stu. You're one in a million. KITTY is holding the cleavage pose for an unnaturally lon furry tail begins to swing back and forth playfully in th hypnotic - like a windshield wiper. STU stares at it. MONKEYBONE stares at it. And MONKEYBONE responds by straightening...stiffening...bending upward s

I'm not so special. I'm just - kind of - STU is suddenly aware of something LONG, RED, and WET unr shoulder. It's a TONGUE...dangling out of MONKEYBONE'S OP lets out a YOWL OF SHOCK. Blushing bright red, he GRABS THE TONGUE and shoves it ma into the monkey mouth whence it came.
Come on, pal! It was a compliment! You'da done the same if you had the equipment!
STU LUNGES at MONKEYBONE - who JUMPS OVER HIM, BOUNDS off the table, and grabs hold of a CHANDELIER.
I'm reportin' this to my union!!
What union?
The sidekicks' union! Me, Tonto, and Robin the Boy Wonder. You top bananas better watch your ass! STU grabs a CHAIR and swings it at the chandelier. MONKEY series of SUBMARINE NOISES -

- and DIVES - directly between KITTY's breasts into her s dress!! STU circles around KITTY, following the undulatin BLOB that's tunnelling around under her dress. Finally MO out of the BACK of the dress and NUZZLES KITTY'S EAR:
I left my phone number in your undies. Try not to lose it in traffic.

Sorry, Kitty! I'll be right back after I choke my monkey. MONKEYBONE runs under the pool table. STU is giving chase suddenly - a DOOR blows open in the chill night wind. EVERYONE IN THE BAR freezes in place. For there, in the doorway, is a looming, ominous figure - dreaded figure in all of Dark Town - - a GRIM REAPER, nine feet tall and swinging a scythe, co hapless coma victim to the land of Death! EERIE WINDS WHISTLE and the shroud FLUTTERS in the night REAPER looks from face to face. For a moment he focuses o backs away involuntarily, with a mounting sense of dread. MONKEYBONE jumps into his arms, clinging to him fearfully But the REAPER moves on - past each COMA VICTIM in turn - STOPPING in front of a TINY, WIZENED, PRUNELIKE OLD GENT wheelchair, who looks to be 110 years old at least.
Him. Whew. About time!
Can't hear you, young fellow. Speak up!

EARL BIEGLER, I'VE COME TO GIVE YOU - aw, hell. Here. GASPS OF ANTICIPATION all around the room as the REAPER h long white ENVELOPE. EARL opens it slowly and removes... ...an oversized rectangular TICKET...the size of a Hershe SOLID GOLD, with the letter "E" stamped upon it. VARIOUS CHARACTERS around the barroom react, in hushed vo
An E-Ticket!
He got a reprieve.
Good for him! He's gonna wake up! EARL throws his crutches aside, jumps out of his chair, a JIG, waving the ticket over his head. STU stares at him w
No. No. Not him.
So long, suckers! See you in the funny papers! EARL does an end-zone dance toward the door. One by one, get up from their seats to watch EARL's departure.

The COMA VICTIMS shuffle toward a BIG RIDE across the mid It's a "TEST YOUR STRENGTH" machine - the kind where you mallet and try to ring the bell. It's surrounded by croco storm fences and electrified barbed wire, and a big sign - NO ADMITTANCE. EARL, still jubilant, inserts his E-ticket into a recepta entrance. A DRAWBRIDGE LOWERS, and CAROUSEL MUSIC cranks CARNIVAL LIGHTS blink on, and FIREWORKS rocket into the s All around them, faces turn skyward. CLOUDS are parting. swirling colors is forming DIRECTLY ABOVE the E-ticket ri PINPOINT HOLE opens up at its center. The "TEST YOUR STRENGTH" machine has been outfitted with the bell-ringer should be. Once EARL has settled in, a GI MAN lifts its enormous mallet... ...and SLAMS IT DOWN on the lever end of the machine, sen ROCKETING UPWARD toward the hole in the sky. DING!! The S BELL, but EARL keeps going - up - up - UP... Then, with a distinct POP, he's gone. Over the rainbow...
He's ninety. He's practically dead already. How come he goes back and I stay here?
Maybe he wanted to pick out his own casket?
(turning abruptly)
STU marches across the street to the GRIM REAPER - who's his WINGED BICYCLE and seems shocked that anyone would wa him. MONKEYBONE scurries alongside, terrified.
He got an E-ticket. Where's mine? When do I get to wake up??
Stu? Stu? Let's not disturb the nice Reaper.
I've been stuck down here for months. Somebody had better start paying attention, or I'm gonna - I'm gonna kick ass!
Let's not kick the nice Reaper's ass. MONKEYBONE practically swoons. But the REAPER just stares
The REAPER climbs onto his winged bike and PEDALS OFF dow STU lets out a HOWL OF FRUSTRATION.

Stu? Stu? Let's calm down, talk things over. How about some comedy relief? Okay. Brontosaurus walks into a gay bar... STU BOOTS MONKEYBONE aside. They're at a GAME STALL manne Cow - the one where you throw baseballs at milk bottles. baseball and HURLS IT at the departing REAPER. The ball hits the REAPER smack on the head, knocking him
(in unison - impressed) Damn. MONKEYBONE cowers in fear as the REAPER gets up, shaking But STU isn't intimidated. He grabs another ball and wind

Stu? Stu? I think weve got this backwards. Your behavior...is disturbing me. The REAPER, scared shitless, jumps back on his bike and P the ball whizzes past. STU starts chasing after him! The REAPER turns down a side street and pedals up an incl the "fingers" of the hand that holds Dark Town. When the end of the finger, it TAKES OFF into the void and KEEPS O
That's right. Run! And don't come back unless you've got my e-ticket!! The REAPER vanishes. STU sits dejectedly on the edge of t
Who am I kidding? I'm never gonna get out of here. I'll never see her again. Just then, a multi-armed MESSENGER BOY in royal livery to CHILD'S SCOOTER. He stops...
Miley? Stu Miley? STU looks up. Six arms reach into six pockets. Finally th finds an ENVELOPE and hands it over. Inside is an ENGRAVE YOU Are Invited to a
at HYPNOS' HIDEAWAY Penthouse Suite - 10 PM Sharp "If You Snooze, You Lose"
STU'S EYES widen with excitement as the MESSENGER scoots
Hypnos! The god of nightmares! Do you know what this means, Monkeybone? He's finally going to hear my case. I'm going home!

As she's done every morning for the last three months, JU STU'S TEETH. Although she looks a bit more worn and hagga saw her last, she always affects a cheerful manner around off chance that he might be aware of her presence. She packs the toothbrush away, runs a hand along his stub
I think we can go another day without shaving. Long as you don't look like you're growing one of those stupid little goatees. She opens up the entertainment section of the daily newsp

Hey, there's an article about the Monkeybone show. They've run that one episode about eight times now. Herb says it gets higher ratings every time...they're hoping you'll give 'em some new material soon... (long, bored pause) Wanna hear another joke? She refolds the paper and reaches into a bedside drawer f entitled The Book of Raunch. She pages through it for a m

Okay...let me see...here we go. A plane full of explorers crashlands in New Guinea; they are captured by a cannibal tribe and taken to the chief's hut, where...wait a minute. I know this one... (reading ahead) You stinker! You swiped this joke for a Monkeybone strip! She whacks him on the arm with the book. No response at a
Okay. Let's try again. Why did the pervert cross the road? The sound of SOBBING interrupts her joke. She looks up an standing in the doorway, red-eyed and crying.
Kimmy! What's the matter?

This is hard for me, Julie...very hard...but it's been three months now, and... (long pause) I gave the order. JULIE just stares at her for a beat or two, refusing to u it sinks in. Her hand goes to her mouth in horror and gri
CAMERA TRACKS up the seemingly endless length of the HYPN up, THROUGH a heavy layer of clouds, to the ROTATING PENT the building... ...which is festooned with oodles of 18-INCH DSS SATELLIT

ELEVATOR DOORS open, and we glide into the swank, swingin bachelor pad of HYPNOS, God of Sleep. A giant flying CUPI tiny bumblebee wings somehow keeping his vast bulk aloft. HYP'S HIDEAWAY occupies the entire penthouse floor, and t party in full effect. A rotating disco ball flashes color walls, floors, and ceilings covered with shockadelic OP-A

Now this...is livin'. Of course, a party needs party animals - and the DARKTOWN scene are in fine fettle, working up a sweat on the dance SLEEPY ZZZ'S has three turntables spinning at once. As STU wanders through, he gets a big surprise. Reproduct NIGHTMARE PAINTINGS are hanging on the walls! They've bee ONE-SHEETS for the coming attractions at the Morpheum.
Y'call that art? Why, my three-year-old can paint better than that.

Like you'd know. You started out on the back of a napkin, you little...doodle. Scowling at each other, the boys turn their backs and par follow MONKEYBONE to the wet bar, where he almost immedia a statuesque GORGON with a full head of writhing SNAKES.
Hey! Like the do. So tell me, are you a, uhh... natural snakehead?
Only fifty dollars to find out.
Fifty dollars?! Bite me!

You got it, big boy. He grins and shrugs: what the hell. As they head for a ba BARTENDER hands him a SNAKEBITE KIT. A look of apprehension crosses MONKEYBONE's face. But bef change his mind, the GORGON'S HAND yanks him out of frame STU, meanwhile, is crossing the dance floor, moving among animal-people who DANCE in their bizarre, uninhibited way WOMAN - the bottom half of her body a big human HAND - SM he passes. He tries to talk to her, but she's dancing, an constantly moving legs it's difficult to get in close.
Say, have you seen Mr. Hypnos?
Hyp? He was here a while ago. Aren't you Stu Miley? The nightmare guy? STU grins meekly, nods yes. She pulls him over to dance.

I heard you were going to be here tonight. This is so cool! JUMBO the ELEPHANT GOD is dancing in ungainly fashion nea swings out and hits one of the HAND WOMAN'S arms - which marble statuary. Before she can let out a squeal, he does she's armless - a regular Venus de Milo!
You fat slob! Watch what you're doing!
Why don't you slap me? Go on, slap me!

Come on, Stu. Let's go where the real fun is. She leads him over to the sunken living room. Among the o see a CYCLOPS, a YETI, a BBQ PIG. A number of sofas and l are arranged around a big crystal ORB in the center of th The ORB is where nightmares happen. Although the perspect the locales change abruptly, as in a movie, all the night 3-D quality - as if they're taking place right here in th
Wow. Live feed, huh?
You bet. Hyp gets all the best stuff before it goes out to the theatres. STU grins in anticipation. He finds an empty chair and st down - but there's a SLUG with a MAN'S HEAD already in it
Sorry. STU picks another seat. The HAND WOMAN sidles up alongsid
Shh! There's a new one just starting.

In long shot we see a handsome young couple dressed in pa Emerging from a sylvan glade, they kiss in golden sunligh breaks free - sprints through knee-high sunflowers to the field, where a picnic blanket is waiting.
HIS FACE GOES PALE as he recognizes the man in the paisle
That - that's me.
Nice shirt, dude!

Paisley-shirted STU pours champagne for two. Toasts his b is, of course, JULIE, the dreamer of the dream. He pulls out a little velvet RING BOX and offers it to he tries to take it, he pulls it away, teasing her, and STEA Suddenly the two of them are locked in a tight embrace, r through the flowers, LAUGHING, full of joy.
The DARKTOWNERS are rubbing their hands together in antic horrors to come. STU looks from one misshapen face to the heart pounding with dread.
What is this? Who's dreaming this?? (beat) Julie??
Hey, keep it down!
JULIE rolls onto her back on the grass, FACE AGLOW. Only that STU IS NO LONGER THERE BESIDE HER. She looks around. Gets to her feet. Turns. And the BACKGR MORPHS suddenly into...

The room is decorated for a FAREWELL PARTY, complete with confetti. KIMMY, DR. EDELSTEIN, various MEDICAL PERSONNEL are wearing party hats, lifting champagne glasses in a to guest of honor...the comatose Stu!

The DARKTOWNERS clustered around the orb can barely conce excitement. It's obvious that the nightmares they're watc than mere entertainment - they get some kind of addictive charge from the spectacle of human terror.
He tries to push his way forward to the orb. An angry CYC aside. A YETI grabs his coat and pushes him out of the wa
Stu!! What are you doing? Chill out!!

COMATOSE STU stands in the center of the room, UPRIGHT an party hat. A weird UMBILICAL CORD extends from his navel groaning BELLOWS DEVICE - like an artificial lung, it's a him breathing. EDELSTEIN hands a pair of OVERSIZED CEREMONIAL SCISSORS t she CUTS THE CORD, as if opening a new mall. Applause all races toward STU in slo-mo, SHRIEKING - - as he DEFLATES into a LIMP PUDDLE OF FLESH before her e
No. No. STU!
JULIE's distress is killing him. Yet all around him, DARK cackling their heads off, growling, howling, punching the air like rowdy drunks at a football game. He LOSES IT ALT
He won't be stopped this time. He makes for the orb - cli sofas, pushing guests aside, knocking over their drinks -
HEY! Watch it, you stinkin' gringo -
Somehow, JULIE has heard him!! Down in the nightmare orb, is looking UP, trying to locate the source of STU's disem He struggles to reach the orb, but the CYCLOPS is holding
Stu? STU...? STU breaks free and FLINGS HIMSELF on the ORB - which SHO haze of smoke and sparks, abruptly ending the nightmare. vanishes - and STU gropes at the air, DESPAIRING.
The real JULIE awakens suddenly and lets out a scream of
Only now does she realize where she is. She's fallen asle visitor's chair next to STU's bed. The clock on the wall STU'S READOUTS are spiking like crazy.
STU is being dragged across the dance floor by the YETI a ELEPHANT GOD. HAND WOMAN brings up the rear.
Who invited this schmuck, anyway?
Oh, it's my fault. I thought he was cooler than that.
Listen. Please. It's my girlfriend. I've gotta get a message to her... But just then a hush falls over the room, and someone scr

A WALL PANEL does a 180-degree turn, and a CIRCULAR BED r room. Languishing atop it, garbed in a silk robe which ex the black & white checkerboard pattern of the bedspread.. ...is a CHUBBY, GRINNING, SLEEPY-EYED SATYR, with horns a WASP WOMEN are with him on the bed, brushing his furry go feeding him grapes. As STU fights his way over, he sees an odd LUMP wriggling bedcovers. Out pops MONKEYBONE, clutching a bottle of cha
I knew I left it in there somewhere. He shakes the bottle, pops the cork, and SPRAYS SPURTING HYPNOS, the GIRLS, and everyone else within firing range!
Haw! I like a monkey with vision!
You said it, partner! Hilarity all around. STU snatches MONKEYBONE off the bed
How'd you get in there?
Stu... It's a party.
Mr. Hypnos - sir - I needed to talk to you -

Wait a minute. Stu Miley, right? Boys and girls ...Mr. Stu Miley, in the house! (leading a round of applause) This is an honor. We see a lot of nightmares down here, but yours are like caviar, man. You da shits!!
Mr. Hypnos, I saw a dream. My girlfriend was having it. She dreamed they were pulling the plug on me. She was watching me die.
Uh huh. And?

Well, I have to get a message to her. I have to let her know I'm okay. Until I can get out of here... A vaguely embarrassed look crosses HYPNOS's face. All the DARKTOWNERS stare at their shoes, clear their throats.

...which is actually what I wanted to talk to you about. See, I've been here three months - With a brusque gesture, HYPNOS sends the party girls pack one arm around STU's shoulder and pulls him aside.
Kid - didn't they tell you about this party?
Tell me what?
It's a special kind of party. A farewell party. Do you...get what I'm saying?
Farewell? You mean - you mean I'm - STU EXPLODES WITH JOY. He practically dances a jig.
One by one, the celebrants turn their backs and slink dis
I think I...I'm about to... Am I mistaken, or don't I get to... Is there some...
Y'see, Stu, as I understand it, you made this pact with your sister...no life support? MONKEYBONE's jaw drops. He slaps himself across the foreh
Pact? Pact? NO LIFE SUPPORT??

Well - yeah - but that doesn't...apply. It was different then. I was depressed. My life is great now. I'm in love! MONKEYBONE marches back and forth across the bed, wearing expression as he MOCKS STU in a singsongy voice...
Pull the plug! Pull the plug! Take my organs! I don't need 'em! I don't need no! Life support! I'm an idiot! Pull the pl-- STU grabs the monkey and clamps a hand over his mouth.
Besides, Julie wouldn't...she'd never...
Actually, Stu, Julie doesn't get to decide. That's why she was having the nightmare. (an embarrassed shrug) They're pulling the plug at nine AM.
Nine AM! But that's - twelve hours. In checking his watch, STU removes his hand from MONKEYBO singsong resumes...
I'm so dumb! I deserve to die -
Mr. Hypnos, you run this place. I'm begging you. There's gotta be something I can do.
Stu, I like you personally, I admire your work, but I'm just the God of Sleep. This is Death's bailiwick.
Maybe you could talk to Death!

Me? Me, go crawling to Death? My friend, it will be a cold, cold day in Las Vegas, Nevada, before I go crawling to that piece of - HYP shuts up. Looks around the room, as if he's afraid of overheard. Then he gestures to the boys to join him on th They climb aboard eagerly. HYPNOS hits his remote...
...and they rotate AWAY from the party. Privacy at last.
Now Death is not what you would call a people person, like me. Death is a putz - and I should know. I'm his little brother.
You're Death's brother?

Oh yeah. Mr. By-the-book, Stick-Up-the-Ass, My- Way-or-the-Highway Death. Believe me - over the course of eternity, you get pretty damned tired of that schtick. (spreading his hands) So I need a job. He sticks me in this broke-down amusement park, with a buncha animals to run it. I'm supposed to be grateful?
The penthouse is pretty swank, though.
Thank you. I decorated it myself.
Guys, I don't mean to be rude, but I only have eleven hours and fifty-three minutes to...

Oh, right. Cheating Death. There's one thing you might try. Only one guy in history ever pulled it off. Well, actually two. Actually, no, there was that other guy who...well, very few people have done it.
Hyp, I'll do anything.
Me too. And I mean anything. Ask the chicks in the back room.
You've seen those E-tickets, right? Well, what you gotta do...is go into the Land of Death... and steal an E-ticket right out from under Death's nose.
Land of Death. How do I get there?
Kid, listen: that's all I'm saying. And you didn't hear it from me. HYP hits the remote. The bed begins to ROTATE OUTWARD aga
You've heard of a fate worse than Death? That's what's waiting for you if you screw up.
HYP gives the boys a wink and a thumbs-up, then wanders o his other guests. MONKEYBONE shakes STU's hand.
Fate worse than death! Well, it's been real, boss, but I gotta go buff up my resume. ANYBODY
Fine! Don't put yourself out. I'll go to the land of Death alone.
Stu, you have my absolute confidence. - DEAD
(grabbing him by the throat) I've got one chance to get back to Julie, and I'm gonna take it - with or without you. He turns and stalks off. MONKEYBONE stands there blinking
Hey. Aren't you gonna talk me into it?
No. Goodbye. Thanks for nothing. Stunned, MONKEYBONE scurries along behind him, PLEADING.

You gotta talk me into it. You'll screw up on your own. I mean, a guy's gotta have a sidekick. For moral support! Wisecracks - snappy banter - (wrapping himself around STU's leg) It's the land of Death, Stu, the Land of Death! Don't go in there without your comedy relief!!
All right. You can come.
(suddenly realizing) Something went very, very wrong here.

Now we just gotta figure out how to get there. As if in reply, a PALE, SPECTRAL PRESENCE comes drifting dance floor - an eight-foot-tall GRIM REAPER. The boys duck behind a POTTED PLANT to watch as he zeroes BAR - where a beautiful coma victim, LULU, is drunkenly m another sloshed corpse-to-be, FRED.

head_text.subj: LULU LA RUE. I HAVE COME FOR YOU.

text: LULU doesn't notice. She continues grappling with FRED. M REAPER dives in and tries to disentangle them.

head_text.subj: LULU LA RUE, I HAVE COME FOR -

text: Shay, you're kinda cute. She ditches FRED and throws her arms around the REAPER. R pushes her away, props her against the nearest wall - - and TOUCHES HER with one bony finger above the heart! I throwing a switch. Her body stiffens. Her EYES cross. Her out of her mouth. She makes a noise like a DIAL TONE. The true horror of death is that it makes you look like a The REAPER pulls a collapsible HAND TRUCK from beneath hi starts maneuvering LULU onto it.
Say there. How 'bout one for the road? The REAPER ignores him. FRED holds up a cocktail glass.
Hold this for me, pally. The REAPER heaves a sigh and takes the cocktail glass. FR pitcher filled with some luminescent tropical concoction. ...and POURS IT down the REAPER's front!
Ooopsy daisy.
WINCING at the REAPER in his sopping wet, pink-stained sh
Is that what they call "death with dignity"? The REAPER wrings out his shroud and grabs the hand truck LULU past the boys, MONKEYBONE pops up with a helpful hin
Two words for you, my friend: club soda. STU claps a hand over MB's mouth as the REAPER turns down
The still-muttering REAPER wheels LULU toward the entranc The boys are skulking along behind him at a discreet dist
He's taking her to the land of Death, right? So all we've gotta do is...hitch a ride! (beat) Stop shaking! I'll protect you.

Oh, sure. Mr. Action Hero! Why couldn't I be Arnold Schwarzenegger's figment? The REAPER approaches the GATES. He presses a remote-cont the meshing teeth of the gates slide back far enough to l through. STU realizes they've only got an instant to make their mo through the gates at top speed. As soon as he's on the ot hears a nasty CLANG behind him... MONKEYBONE is caught - his body contorted like a pretzel, out among the meshing teeth! STU gives him a good hard YA slips out like a strand of fettuccine. They hear RUMBLING on the tracks outside. A CAR is arrivi
